text: Ila wanhu nawamlonjela Sauli, “Ndaze, Yonatani kobagama, yula yawele nakegala kusumya kukulu ako Isilaeli? Hebu, kota Mkulu Nguluwi vyoyalingikala, haduhu mnvili ne imwe ya mutwi wa heye iwele yolagala, kwa vila nakadita mbuli ayi lehano kwa kutanzigwa na Nguluwi.” Lelo wanhu nawamgombola Yonatani yaleche kukopoligwa.
